title: GOODLIFELAB
subtitle: Software Engineer
description: Psychology-based mental care and wellness startup
projects: Developed a React-based client application for the MVP service, generating personalized PDF reports and reducing export time from 7-10 days to under 2 hours for 200-300 users.
Created an engaging, storyline-driven psychological test named ‘바라던 바다 성격유형 테스트’, inspired by the Big 5 model, attracting over 5.1 million users by implementing dynamic backgrounds and answer sheets.
